text: Akave, (manitarkale!) Ninkal unkal iraivanin mannippai nokkiyum, corkkattai nokkiyum muntic cellunkal. Accorkkattin vicalamo vanam, pumiyin vicalattaippol irukkiratu. Atu allahvaiyum avanutaiya tutaraiyum nampikkai kontavarkalukkakave tayarpatuttappattirukkiratu. Itu allahvutaiya arulakum. Itai avan virumpiyavarkalukke kotukkiran. Allah makattana arulalan
